title: A Star is born
creator_credit: George Cukor, Sid Luft, Transcona Enterprises and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: A powerful musical re-make of the 1937 classic and one of Judy Garland’s greatest hits. She plays a successful wife and actress while her husband (James Mason) sinks in the opposite direction.
creator_credit_for_label: George Cukor, Sid Luft, Transcona Enterprises and Warner Bros Pictures
